title: 5 Minute Vacations
description: Tired? Stressed? Need a break?  You are not alone.  Instead of reaching for another coffee, take a short journey with me. We will visit places where you can replace some of your current stress with a moment to cherish.  No exercises to do. No program to follow. No guilt for not being a better person.  Just relax into these tranquil scenes, and give your mind a five-minute vacation. In these pages, you can escape from the everyday, and find your happy place.
author: Cindy Tomamichel
